entity.Name: Opportunity

Description.description: Potential revenue-generating event, or sale to an account, which needs to be tracked through a sales process to completion.
Unique identifier of the user who created the opportunity.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the opportunity.
Select the customer account or contact to provide a quick link to additional customer details, such as address, phone number, activities, and orders.
Type some notes about the customer's requirements, to help the sales team identify products and services that could meet their requirements.
Estimated date on which the opportunity is expected to close.
Exchange rate for the currency associated with the opportunity with respect to the base currency.
Specifies whether estimated revenue is to be calculated by the system or provided by the user.
Specifies whether estimated revenue is to be calculated by the system or provided by the user.
Unique identifier of the user who last modified the opportunity.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the opportunity.
Value of the Total Amount with VAT in base currency.
Value of the VAT in base currency.
Unique identifier of the user or team who owns the opportunity.
Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the opportunity.

entity.MobileOfflineFilters: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"> <entity name="opportunity"> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="last-x-days" value="10"/> </filter> </entity> </fetch>
